name: Armenia
description: Temperatures may climb to 25°C in lowland areas. Spring rains and melting snows bring bigger, faster rivers.

name: Austria
description: Spring has properly sprung and city gardens are at their blooming best. Room rates and crowds remain low. Snow still polishes the highest peaks of the Alps.

name: Azerbaijan
description: Temperatures may climb to 25°C in lowland areas. Spring rains and melting snows bring bigger, faster rivers.

name: Belgium
description: At Easter children seek out eggs in their gardens, deposited there by the 'Bells of Rome'.

name: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
Croatia
description: Soak up some sunshine and enjoy the solitude on southern islands and the coastline. Continental Croatia is still chilly, but trees start to blossom and, as rivers swell with water, rafting and kayaking are tops.

name: Cyprus
description: The temperature can be perfect but expect crowds and a hike in flight and accommodation prices; it's school-holiday time during the Easter break.

name: Czech Republic
description: The weather transforms from shivers to sunshine. By the end of the month town squares are covered with outdoor cafe tables, and peak tourist season begins.

name: Denmark
description: Spring has sprung! Warmer, drier days bring out the blossoms, and attractions that were closed for the winter reopen (including Legoland at the start of the month).

name: Estonia
description: Frosty nights officially come to an end as the mean temperature stabilises well above zero. Hope of spring has arrived; locals burst forth from their shuttered houses to inhale the fickle spring air.

name: Finland
description: Easter is celebrated in a traditional fashion. Spring begins in southern Finland, but there's still solid snow cover in the northern reaches. It's a great month for outdoor activities in Lapland.

name: France
description: Dedicated ski fiends can carve glaciers in the highest French ski resorts until mid-April or later at highest altitudes. Then it's off with the ski boots and on with the hiking gear as peach and almond trees flower pink against a backdrop of snowcapped peaks.

name: Georgia
description: Temperatures may climb to 25°C in lowland areas. Spring rains and melting snows bring bigger, faster rivers and the start of the main whitewater rafting season (until July).

name: Germany
description: Come April, there's no escaping the Easter Bunny in Germany. Meanwhile, nothing epitomises the arrival of spring more than the first crop of white asparagus. Germans go nuts for it.

name: Greece
description: A great month to visit with the scent of orange blossom heavy in the air. Easter weekend is busy with vacationing Greeks; reserve accommodation well in advance. Some businesses shut up shop for the week.

name: Hungary
description: In April the brief interval between winter and summer looks, feels and smells like an old-fashioned spring.

name: Iceland
description: Easter is celebrated in a traditional fashion (Easter-egg hunts and roast lamb), and spring is in the air. Days lengthen and the mercury climbs, meaning greenery after the snow melts, plus the arrival of thousands of migrating birds.

name: Ireland
description: The weather is getting better, the flowers are beginning to bloom and the festival season begins anew. Seasonal attractions start to open up around the middle of the month or at Easter.

name: Italy
description: April sees the Italian peninsula bloom. The gardens of northern Italy show off tulips and early camellias, and the mountains of Sicily and Calabria fill with wildflowers.

name: Latvia
description: Frosty nights officially come to an end as the mean temperature stabilises well above zero. Hope of spring has arrived; locals burst forth from their shuttered houses to inhale the fickle spring air.

name: Lithuania
description: Frosty nights officially come to an end as the mean temperature stabilises well above zero. Hope of spring has arrived; locals burst forth from their shuttered houses to inhale the fickle spring air.

name: Netherlands
description: April is all about King's Day in the Netherlands. It's the show-stopping highlight of Amsterdam's jam-packed calendar, but you'll find celebrations taking place all over the country.

name: Norway
description: April has surprisingly few festivals of note and represents something of a breathing space between the end-of-winter celebrations and action-packed Norwegian summers. The weather is improving and few tourists are around.

name: Poland
description: After a slow month in March, April begins to pick up with ever-lengthening days, budding trees, and warm, sunny afternoons that promise better days ahead. Easter is a big travel weekend.

name: Portugal
description: Spring arrives, bringing warmer temperatures and abundant sunshine in both the north and the south. Late April sees a profusion of wildflowers in the south.

name: Romania
description: If you're partial to blossoming trees, this is the most beautiful month of the year. Easter is the high point of the Orthodox calendar, and Easter fairs and painted-egg festivals abound.

name: Slovenia
description: Flowers bloom and trees blossom in lower elevations. Depending on the winter, there's skiing at higher elevations. The Vrsic Pass opens to cars by late April.

name: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Spain
description: Spain has a real spring in its step, with wildflowers in full bloom, Easter celebrations and school holidays. It requires some advance planning (book ahead), but it's a great time to be here.

name: Sweden
description: The weather's still cold, but the days are longer and brighter.

name: Switzerland
description: Spring, with its pretty, flower-strewn meadows, suddenly pops into that magnificent Alpine vista and the first fair-weather walkers arrive.

name: Turkey
description: Spring. April and May are high season in istanbul and shoulder season elsewhere. Not a great month to get a tan in northern Turkey, but you can enjoy balmy, breezy weather in the southwest.

name: Ukraine
description: Things begin to warm up along the southern coast, but inland you'll still need those chunky Hutsul woollen socks. Visit Kyiv at the end of the month when thousands of chestnut trees begin to bloom.

name: United Kingdom
description: The weather slowly improves, with warmer and drier days bringing out spring blossoms. Attractions that close for the low season open around the middle of the month or at Easter.
